full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement:
#### Request for Proposal for Three Forklifts

[Reference Information]
* Solicitation Number: WS3599552601
* Reference Number: WS3599552601-Doc3599552651
* Tender Closing Date: June 13, 2023 00:00 EDT (Please note the amendment to the closing time)

[Contract Details]
* Procurement Category: Goods and Services (GD)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Tendering
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: None
* Regions of Delivery: Canada
* Contracting Entity Name: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contracting Entity Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

[Procurement Description]
This Request for Proposal (RFP) seeks to acquire three (3) Forklifts, as per the description provided below. The procurement will be governed by the rules and regulations outlined in the solicitation documents.

* UNSPSC Code: 24101603
* UNSPSC Description: Forklifts

[End User Entity and Point of Contact]
* End User Entity: Department of Industry (ISED)
* End User Entity Address: 235 Queen Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0H5, Canada
* Point of Contact: Theresa McGowan (SPAC/PSPC) - theresa.mcgowan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

[Submissions]
Please ensure that all required supporting documentation and bid submissions are received by June 13, 2023, 00:00 EDT, to be considered for this procurement. Late bids will be declared non-responsive.

*Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and BuyandSell posting closing time.*

Note: All attachments, notice URLs and other additional text have been intentionally left out to meet the word limit.
